name: Non-linear TQFT CS Mapping
description: Construction of non-linear algebraic mapping to TQFT CS level k with high Witten consistency.

hypothesis.H0: No mapping k(T) achieves Witten consistency rate > 80% or mapping remains tautological (r >= 0.95 with V).
hypothesis.H1: A non-linear/parity-shifted mapping k(T) achieves > 80% Witten consistency and remains non-tautological.

data_requirements.description: Determinant and Volume data from topology_assignments.json.

test_method: Discrete functional mapping evaluation and permutation testing for significance.
